entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:27 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
